forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 46. North wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 57 in the afternoon. North wind around 9 mph.

weather_report:
As the quiet hours of the night embrace Downtown San Francisco, the sky presents a clear, tranquil scene with temperatures dipping gently towards a cool 46 degrees. The crisp northward breeze adds a refreshing touch, coaxing the city to stir in its slumber. In the morning light, expect the sun to rise joyfully, wrapping the day in warmth, with a high nudging near 60 degrees. By the afternoon, temperatures will soften to around 57, a comfortable yet nippy embrace as the winds subtly pick up speed.

The day unfolds with a bright, unobstructed clarity—an invitation for serene meanderings through the urban landscape. Fog holds back, allowing the iconic structures like the Golden Gate Bridge to stand in majestic silhouette against the azure backdrop. As you step outside, consider layering your attire: a light sweater or jacket will serve well against the cool breeze as you traverse its lively streets. This is a splendid day for taking a moment at a local café, breathing in the aroma of freshly brewed coffee, or perhaps enjoying a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero, where the beauty of the bay is unclouded. All in all, a delightful day awaits those who venture out into the open arms of this vibrant city.
